TERM: Robot Action

DEFINITION:
Robot Action: Next, we can integrate an Internet of Things (IoT) module to enable the system to interact with smart devices. This will enable the system to collect data from various sensors and devices, and make decisions based on that data.

Confidence: 0.615

[From Codebase]: The action is the invocation of the `generate_code_from_spec` method. The inputs logged to the ThoughtTrail will include:
- Specification hash (for traceability)
- Target file path
- Model used
- Timestamp
